belongs_to_collection.name: Straight Men & the Men Who Love Them Collection

original_title: Straight Men & the Men Who Love Them
overview: A collection of 7 shorts that explores the relationships between gay men and straight men.  Includes: Coffee Date (2001); In the Name of the Father [Em Nome do Pai] (2002); Misguided (2002); Popcorn & Coke (2004); Space 2 [Espacio 2] (2001); Truth or Dare [Verdade ou Consequência] (2002); Uninhibited (2004).
title: Straight Men & the Men Who Love Them
